channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large ponding on corner of junction, 7th May
item.description:
Since the road has been resurfaced a large ponding occurs when it rains. The falls on the road do not take the water to any road gullies.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishops Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Water leak?, 7th May
item.description:
Water coming up through what looks like a telecoms manhole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severn Trent tarmac not done correctly, 7th May
item.description:
They done some work on the path and the tarmac was rushed by my house number 11 and by number 7 too. It’s still really soft and when you stand in it it moves under your feet and there is a hole forming in it which is dangerous as kids walk on this path daily and risk of it opening up worse and falling down. The tarmac hasn’t set correctly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Richards Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Push button for crossing is not working, 7th May
item.description:
Middle of the road opposite Tesco. The button hasn't been working for weeks now and so I thought I'd bring it to your attention. I tagged in the the street thingy your using now and took a screenshot from Google Street View so I hope that helps.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: X5 drains between Dowding Way and Community Centre, 7th May
item.description:
Drains/gulleys have been cleaned and emptied of the accumulation of annual leaves and branches on Fri 3 May on Parton Road, GL3 2JH. Unfortunately, it appears that five have been missed along Parton Road, Churchdown, post code GL3 2JH. x4 between the junction of Dowding Way and entrance to the Community Centre. x1 outside house named 'Glan Nant'. The grids were not opened and are still full of leaves. Contractor needs to be made aware they have been missed and re-visit. Initially reported to TBC but they say it is a County Council issue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Pot Hole Sort ASAP, 7th May
item.description:
Numerous large pot holes that have been there numerous months now. Potential to damage vehicles please sort ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 7th May
item.description:
Grass on reservation is overgrown and blocks visibility of traffic pulling out of the lane
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole on pavement overflowing after rain for days., 7th May
item.description:
The manhole is outside 2 The Maples. Problem getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, The Reddings, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Triangular 'Beware Pedestrians' sign + '<-- P Regent Arcade' car park direction sign currently pointing to Montpellier Walk shops & Montpellier Arcade, on same post. These two signs appear to have been twisted on their post around 180 degrees so that they face S towards Montpellier (Rotunda) Roundabout rather than N towards Cheltenham town centre. A Google Street View photo of March 2023 shows these two signs both facing in the opposite direction, ie towards the town centre., 7th May
item.description:
At N end of island in middle of A4015 Montpellier Walk, Cheltenham, in front of The Ivy restaurant (Rotunda building). What3Words = stuck.trunk.jokes .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin has disappeared, 7th May
item.description:
A bin has been removed from a frame on the playing field. It hasn't been replaced but people keep dropping litter in the frame. Please could it be replaced - thanks
